snippet: Attention is turning to John F. Kennedy’s Camelot with as much intensity as the commemorations last week for the 50th anniversary of the March on Washington.
abstract: Commemorations are planned for 50th anniversary of assassination of John F Kennedy, America's 35th president; museum curators, book publishers, filmmakers, documentary producers, magazine editors and conspiracy theorists are betting that historic tragedy once again captivates nation.
lead_paragraph: Attention is turning to John F. Kennedy’s Camelot with as much intensity as the commemorations last week for the 50th anniversary of the March on Washington.

headline.main: A Camelot Nostalgia Tour for Those Who Remember, and Those Who Don’t
headline.print_headline: A Camelot Nostalgia Tour for Those Who Remember, and Those Who Don’t
